Detailed Description

ConfFile is a class which represents a configuration file. The data in this file is of the form key=value.

Member Function Documentation

void ConfFile::extractKeyValues (  void   )  [private]
 

Extracts all key/value pairs from the file. The format is key=value.

string ConfFile::getKeyValue (  const string  key  )  [private]
 

Search for the key and return its value as string. If not found return an empty string.
